title: Polish lawmakers fail to revive controversial crypto bill after presidential veto
description: Polish lawmakers failed to overturn a presidential veto on the Crypto-Asset Market Act, stalling EU-aligned regulation and widening divisions over crypto oversight.
content: The lower house of Polands parliament failed to secure the required three-fifths majority to override President Karol Nawrockis veto of the Crypto-Asset Market Act, pushing the country further away f… [+2476 chars]

raw_data.author: Cointelegraph by Sam Bourgi
